content: An update from Oklahoma . The state law passed today, 37 to 9, had a few liberals in the mix, an amendment to place the Ten Commandments on the front entrance to the state capitol. The feds in D.C., along with the ACLU, said it would be a mistake. Hey this is a conservative state, based on Christian values...! Guess what..........We did it anyway. We recently passed a law in the state to incarcerate all illegal immigrants, and ship them back to where they came from, unless they want to get a green card and become an American citizen. They all scattered. Hope we didn't send any of them to your state. This was against the advice of the Federal Government, and the ACLU, they said it would be a mistake. Guess what..........we did it anyway. Yesterday we passed a law to include DNA samples from any and all illegals to the Oklahoma database, for criminal investigative purposes. Pelosi said it was unconstitutional. Guess what........they did it anyway. Several weeks ago, we passed a law, declaring Oklahoma as a Sovereign state, not under the Federal Government directives. That, for your information, makes Oklahoma and Texas the only states to do so. Guess what.........More states are likely to follow. Louisiana, Alabama, Georgia, both Carolina's, Tennessee, Kentucky, Missouri, Arkansas, West Virginia, just to name a few. Should Mississippi act, so will Florida . Save your confederate money, it appears the South is about to rise up once again. The federal Government has made bold steps to take away our guns. Oklahoma, a week ago, passed a law confirming people in this state have the right to bear arms and transport them in their vehicles. I'm sure that was a set back for the Kennedys and Ms Pelosi. Guess what..........they did it anyway. By the way, Obama does not like any of this. Guess what....who cares...they are doing it anyway. They ain't skeert of the liberal press..God bless 'em. I hope the rest of the country finds the balls to act before it's too late. Joe Nugent By the way from what i understand this was done June of last year.(2008) D.J. --

content: quote: Originally posted by Elesso: quote: Originally posted by GlassOnion: We want to support a state willing to hold true to American values and not the bs liberals. bad news bud... libs and conservatives are everywhere. in oklahoma they are called "people"... every now and again one group wins an election and the other groups hunkers down. currently it is conservatives, but there is a lot of "freedom" down there and, believe it or not, the people of the good states of Texas and Oklahoma CHOOSE to remain involved. if you are moving because you think there is a new "confederacy" you gots another thing going. neither Texans nor Oakies (conservative or Liberal ) will stand for treason. so... be as free as you want, but not at the cost of the Union, or the bill of rights that cover her. Where we come from – democrat – republican – conservative – liberal – it doesn’t matter much to us… Where we draw the LINE is respect – arrogance – etc… Joe Lieberman is what I’d call a liberal – but he’s also a man of integrity. I don’t agree with his political views but he remained true to the country stood for integrity instead of the arrogant disgraceful liars like Pelosi, Reid, Schumer, Durbin, Kerry, etc… Paying almost 1000-bucks per month for property taxes is a little on the stupid side – unless it is a huge lot. We have 2.5 acres – though its waterfront on a creek off the Chesapeake Bay – raising our taxes from 3k to 10k is not where I want to retire. The hard part is giving up the water. In a few month we’ll drop the crab pots off the side of the pier – and go out every evening and pull in some good size hard crabs… umm steam them puppies up with good ole Old Bay seasoning – man… Rock fish are starting to run now – trout, blue, flounder, hardheads, spot, puppy-drum… man, my honey and I used to fill up coolers full towards the end of summer so we could freeze them… Them and soft-crabs… When the tide is running in or out early in the morning or at dusk – GREAT DAY – man, the big fish just sit at the creeks waiting for the little fish to come in or go out with the tide – I’ve pulled 26” trout, 36” rock, 22” hardhead, 26” puppy-drum.… the only thing better than that – my honey likes fishing more than I do… So, nope, taint running from nothing – just want to find a place where freaking state isn’t addicted to leftist liberalism as is going on in DC. I’d love to find 10-200 acres on the water – secluded – mountains or flat with trees… I even looked at one of those Titan Missile silos they are selling to convert into a residence. Ideally, we’d love to find a big old abandoned commercial building on the water – don’t care how big – an old school – of factory of some sort – so we could convert it. That would be dream for us… We tend to like the ugly stuff… We’ll probably look in Virginia down by Norfolk or something – also North Carolina… We are only about 90 miles southeast of DC. We are down by Patuxent River Naval-Air Station. So, personally, I’d like to move OUT of the TARGET zones for al Qaeda. Once the liberals get through bankrupting our country – selling off our military and dismantling our defenses – my bet is – we will get busted between now and in about 2 yrs. I certainly hope NOT – but at the rate these boneheads in DC are going – their 9/11 denial will be completed – filed in the history files. So, just when things are starting to fall apart because Obama has mortgaged everything to buy votes for the next election – those folks being laid-off now – will start running out of money about then. Their unemployment checks will stop – their 401ks will be depleted or vanished – no more state funding – and all that money promised to create jobs – well, most of that is ONLY for gov jobs – repairing roads, remodeling gov buildings, etc. Yep – so, hopefully I’m wrong – but if NOT, I prefer to stay out of the way – and FAR away from the cities because I just don’t think all those folks are going to like soup kitchens everyday… Maybe I’m too paranoid – hopefully I am – but I want to get out while we can… I’d love to find a big ole farm/commercial building in the mountains on a big ole private lake… Me and my honey will be in heaven… and hey, you’re welcome to come by and hang out… All I need is a room for my stereo to have a place to maintain my sanity… Gots to have my music…

content: quote: Originally posted by Elesso: quote: Originally posted by GlassOnion: We want to support a state willing to hold true to American values and not the bs liberals. bad news bud... libs and conservatives are everywhere. in oklahoma they are called "people"... every now and again one group wins an election and the other groups hunkers down. currently it is conservatives, but there is a lot of "freedom" down there and, believe it or not, the people of the good states of Texas and Oklahoma CHOOSE to remain involved. if you are moving because you think there is a new "confederacy" you gots another thing going. neither Texans nor Oakies (conservative or Liberal ) will stand for treason. so... be as free as you want, but not at the cost of the Union, or the bill of rights that cover her. Where we come from – democrat – republican – conservative – liberal – it doesn’t matter much to us… Where we draw the LINE is respect – arrogance – etc… Joe Lieberman is what I’d call a liberal – but he’s also a man of integrity. I don’t agree with his political views but he remained true to the country stood for integrity instead of the arrogant disgraceful liars like Pelosi, Reid, Schumer, Durbin, Kerry, etc… Paying almost 1000-bucks per month for property taxes is a little on the stupid side – unless it is a huge lot. We have 2.5 acres – though its waterfront on a creek off the Chesapeake Bay – raising our taxes from 3k to 10k is not where I want to retire. The hard part is giving up the water. In a few month we’ll drop the crab pots off the side of the pier – and go out every evening and pull in some good size hard crabs… umm steam them puppies up with good ole Old Bay seasoning – man… Rock fish are starting to run now – trout, blue, flounder, hardheads, spot, puppy-drum… man, my honey and I used to fill up coolers full towards the end of summer so we could freeze them… Them and soft-crabs… When the tide is running in or out early in the morning or at dusk – GREAT DAY – man, the big fish just sit at the creeks waiting for the little fish to come in or go out with the tide – I’ve pulled 26” trout, 36” rock, 22” hardhead, 26” puppy-drum.… the only thing better than that – my honey likes fishing more than I do… So, nope, taint running from nothing – just want to find a place where freaking state isn’t addicted to leftist liberalism as is going on in DC. I’d love to find 10-200 acres on the water – secluded – mountains or flat with trees… I even looked at one of those Titan Missile silos they are selling to convert into a residence. Ideally, we’d love to find a big old abandoned commercial building on the water – don’t care how big – an old school – of factory of some sort – so we could convert it. That would be dream for us… We tend to like the ugly stuff… We’ll probably look in Virginia down by Norfolk or something – also North Carolina… We are only about 90 miles southeast of DC. We are down by Patuxent River Naval-Air Station. So, personally, I’d like to move OUT of the TARGET zones for al Qaeda. Once the liberals get through bankrupting our country – selling off our military and dismantling our defenses – my bet is – we will get busted between now and in about 2 yrs. I certainly hope NOT – but at the rate these boneheads in DC are going – their 9/11 denial will be completed – filed in the history files. So, just when things are starting to fall apart because Obama has mortgaged everything to buy votes for the next election – those folks being laid-off now – will start running out of money about then. Their unemployment checks will stop – their 401ks will be depleted or vanished – no more state funding – and all that money promised to create jobs – well, most of that is ONLY for gov jobs – repairing roads, remodeling gov buildings, etc. Yep – so, hopefully I’m wrong – but if NOT, I prefer to stay out of the way – and FAR away from the cities because I just don’t think all those folks are going to like soup kitchens everyday… Maybe I’m too paranoid – hopefully I am – but I want to get out while we can… I’d love to find a big ole farm/commercial building in the mountains on a big ole private lake… Me and my honey will be in heaven… and hey, you’re welcome to come by and hang out… All I need is a room for my stereo to have a place to maintain my sanity… Gots to have my music…

content: quote: Originally posted by Elesso: quote: Originally posted by GlassOnion: We want to support a state willing to hold true to American values and not the bs liberals. bad news bud... libs and conservatives are everywhere. in oklahoma they are called "people"... every now and again one group wins an election and the other groups hunkers down. currently it is conservatives, but there is a lot of "freedom" down there and, believe it or not, the people of the good states of Texas and Oklahoma CHOOSE to remain involved. if you are moving because you think there is a new "confederacy" you gots another thing going. neither Texans nor Oakies (conservative or Liberal ) will stand for treason. so... be as free as you want, but not at the cost of the Union, or the bill of rights that cover her. Where we come from – democrat – republican – conservative – liberal – it doesn’t matter much to us… Where we draw the LINE is respect – arrogance – etc… Joe Lieberman is what I’d call a liberal – but he’s also a man of integrity. I don’t agree with his political views but he remained true to the country stood for integrity instead of the arrogant disgraceful liars like Pelosi, Reid, Schumer, Durbin, Kerry, etc… Paying almost 1000-bucks per month for property taxes is a little on the stupid side – unless it is a huge lot. We have 2.5 acres – though its waterfront on a creek off the Chesapeake Bay – raising our taxes from 3k to 10k is not where I want to retire. The hard part is giving up the water. In a few month we’ll drop the crab pots off the side of the pier – and go out every evening and pull in some good size hard crabs… umm steam them puppies up with good ole Old Bay seasoning – man… Rock fish are starting to run now – trout, blue, flounder, hardheads, spot, puppy-drum… man, my honey and I used to fill up coolers full towards the end of summer so we could freeze them… Them and soft-crabs… When the tide is running in or out early in the morning or at dusk – GREAT DAY – man, the big fish just sit at the creeks waiting for the little fish to come in or go out with the tide – I’ve pulled 26” trout, 36” rock, 22” hardhead, 26” puppy-drum.… the only thing better than that – my honey likes fishing more than I do… So, nope, taint running from nothing – just want to find a place where freaking state isn’t addicted to leftist liberalism as is going on in DC. I’d love to find 10-200 acres on the water – secluded – mountains or flat with trees… I even looked at one of those Titan Missile silos they are selling to convert into a residence. Ideally, we’d love to find a big old abandoned commercial building on the water – don’t care how big – an old school – of factory of some sort – so we could convert it. That would be dream for us… We tend to like the ugly stuff… We’ll probably look in Virginia down by Norfolk or something – also North Carolina… We are only about 90 miles southeast of DC. We are down by Patuxent River Naval-Air Station. So, personally, I’d like to move OUT of the TARGET zones for al Qaeda. Once the liberals get through bankrupting our country – selling off our military and dismantling our defenses – my bet is – we will get busted between now and in about 2 yrs. I certainly hope NOT – but at the rate these boneheads in DC are going – their 9/11 denial will be completed – filed in the history files. So, just when things are starting to fall apart because Obama has mortgaged everything to buy votes for the next election – those folks being laid-off now – will start running out of money about then. Their unemployment checks will stop – their 401ks will be depleted or vanished – no more state funding – and all that money promised to create jobs – well, most of that is ONLY for gov jobs – repairing roads, remodeling gov buildings, etc. Yep – so, hopefully I’m wrong – but if NOT, I prefer to stay out of the way – and FAR away from the cities because I just don’t think all those folks are going to like soup kitchens everyday… Maybe I’m too paranoid – hopefully I am – but I want to get out while we can… I’d love to find a big ole farm/commercial building in the mountains on a big ole private lake… Me and my honey will be in heaven… and hey, you’re welcome to come by and hang out… All I need is a room for my stereo to have a place to maintain my sanity… Gots to have my music…

content: quote: Originally posted by Elesso: quote: Originally posted by GlassOnion: We want to support a state willing to hold true to American values and not the bs liberals. bad news bud... libs and conservatives are everywhere. in oklahoma they are called "people"... every now and again one group wins an election and the other groups hunkers down. currently it is conservatives, but there is a lot of "freedom" down there and, believe it or not, the people of the good states of Texas and Oklahoma CHOOSE to remain involved. if you are moving because you think there is a new "confederacy" you gots another thing going. neither Texans nor Oakies (conservative or Liberal ) will stand for treason. so... be as free as you want, but not at the cost of the Union, or the bill of rights that cover her. Where we come from – democrat – republican – conservative – liberal – it doesn’t matter much to us… Where we draw the LINE is respect – arrogance – etc… Joe Lieberman is what I’d call a liberal – but he’s also a man of integrity. I don’t agree with his political views but he remained true to the country stood for integrity instead of the arrogant disgraceful liars like Pelosi, Reid, Schumer, Durbin, Kerry, etc… Paying almost 1000-bucks per month for property taxes is a little on the stupid side – unless it is a huge lot. We have 2.5 acres – though its waterfront on a creek off the Chesapeake Bay – raising our taxes from 3k to 10k is not where I want to retire. The hard part is giving up the water. In a few month we’ll drop the crab pots off the side of the pier – and go out every evening and pull in some good size hard crabs… umm steam them puppies up with good ole Old Bay seasoning – man… Rock fish are starting to run now – trout, blue, flounder, hardheads, spot, puppy-drum… man, my honey and I used to fill up coolers full towards the end of summer so we could freeze them… Them and soft-crabs… When the tide is running in or out early in the morning or at dusk – GREAT DAY – man, the big fish just sit at the creeks waiting for the little fish to come in or go out with the tide – I’ve pulled 26” trout, 36” rock, 22” hardhead, 26” puppy-drum.… the only thing better than that – my honey likes fishing more than I do… So, nope, taint running from nothing – just want to find a place where freaking state isn’t addicted to leftist liberalism as is going on in DC. I’d love to find 10-200 acres on the water – secluded – mountains or flat with trees… I even looked at one of those Titan Missile silos they are selling to convert into a residence. Ideally, we’d love to find a big old abandoned commercial building on the water – don’t care how big – an old school – of factory of some sort – so we could convert it. That would be dream for us… We tend to like the ugly stuff… We’ll probably look in Virginia down by Norfolk or something – also North Carolina… We are only about 90 miles southeast of DC. We are down by Patuxent River Naval-Air Station. So, personally, I’d like to move OUT of the TARGET zones for al Qaeda. Once the liberals get through bankrupting our country – selling off our military and dismantling our defenses – my bet is – we will get busted between now and in about 2 yrs. I certainly hope NOT – but at the rate these boneheads in DC are going – their 9/11 denial will be completed – filed in the history files. So, just when things are starting to fall apart because Obama has mortgaged everything to buy votes for the next election – those folks being laid-off now – will start running out of money about then. Their unemployment checks will stop – their 401ks will be depleted or vanished – no more state funding – and all that money promised to create jobs – well, most of that is ONLY for gov jobs – repairing roads, remodeling gov buildings, etc. Yep – so, hopefully I’m wrong – but if NOT, I prefer to stay out of the way – and FAR away from the cities because I just don’t think all those folks are going to like soup kitchens everyday… Maybe I’m too paranoid – hopefully I am – but I want to get out while we can… I’d love to find a big ole farm/commercial building in the mountains on a big ole private lake… Me and my honey will be in heaven… and hey, you’re welcome to come by and hang out… All I need is a room for my stereo to have a place to maintain my sanity… Gots to have my music…
quote: Originally posted by Elesso: quote: Originally posted by GlassOnion: We want to support a state willing to hold true to American values and not the bs liberals. bad news bud... libs and conservatives are everywhere. in oklahoma they are called "people"... every now and again one group wins an election and the other groups hunkers down. currently it is conservatives, but there is a lot of "freedom" down there and, believe it or not, the people of the good states of Texas and Oklahoma CHOOSE to remain involved. if you are moving because you think there is a new "confederacy" you gots another thing going. neither Texans nor Oakies (conservative or Liberal ) will stand for treason. so... be as free as you want, but not at the cost of the Union, or the bill of rights that cover her.
reply: Where we come from – democrat – republican – conservative – liberal – it doesn’t matter much to us… Where we draw the LINE is respect – arrogance – etc… Joe Lieberman is what I’d call a liberal – but he’s also a man of integrity. I don’t agree with his political views but he remained true to the country stood for integrity instead of the arrogant disgraceful liars like Pelosi, Reid, Schumer, Durbin, Kerry, etc… Paying almost 1000-bucks per month for property taxes is a little on the stupid side – unless it is a huge lot. We have 2.5 acres – though its waterfront on a creek off the Chesapeake Bay – raising our taxes from 3k to 10k is not where I want to retire. The hard part is giving up the water. In a few month we’ll drop the crab pots off the side of the pier – and go out every evening and pull in some good size hard crabs… umm steam them puppies up with good ole Old Bay seasoning – man… Rock fish are starting to run now – trout, blue, flounder, hardheads, spot, puppy-drum… man, my honey and I used to fill up coolers full towards the end of summer so we could freeze them… Them and soft-crabs… When the tide is running in or out early in the morning or at dusk – GREAT DAY – man, the big fish just sit at the creeks waiting for the little fish to come in or go out with the tide – I’ve pulled 26” trout, 36” rock, 22” hardhead, 26” puppy-drum.… the only thing better than that – my honey likes fishing more than I do… So, nope, taint running from nothing – just want to find a place where freaking state isn’t addicted to leftist liberalism as is going on in DC. I’d love to find 10-200 acres on the water – secluded – mountains or flat with trees… I even looked at one of those Titan Missile silos they are selling to convert into a residence. Ideally, we’d love to find a big old abandoned commercial building on the water – don’t care how big – an old school – of factory of some sort – so we could convert it. That would be dream for us… We tend to like the ugly stuff… We’ll probably look in Virginia down by Norfolk or something – also North Carolina… We are only about 90 miles southeast of DC. We are down by Patuxent River Naval-Air Station. So, personally, I’d like to move OUT of the TARGET zones for al Qaeda. Once the liberals get through bankrupting our country – selling off our military and dismantling our defenses – my bet is – we will get busted between now and in about 2 yrs. I certainly hope NOT – but at the rate these boneheads in DC are going – their 9/11 denial will be completed – filed in the history files. So, just when things are starting to fall apart because Obama has mortgaged everything to buy votes for the next election – those folks being laid-off now – will start running out of money about then. Their unemployment checks will stop – their 401ks will be depleted or vanished – no more state funding – and all that money promised to create jobs – well, most of that is ONLY for gov jobs – repairing roads, remodeling gov buildings, etc. Yep – so, hopefully I’m wrong – but if NOT, I prefer to stay out of the way – and FAR away from the cities because I just don’t think all those folks are going to like soup kitchens everyday… Maybe I’m too paranoid – hopefully I am – but I want to get out while we can… I’d love to find a big ole farm/commercial building in the mountains on a big ole private lake… Me and my honey will be in heaven… and hey, you’re welcome to come by and hang out… All I need is a room for my stereo to have a place to maintain my sanity… Gots to have my music…

content: quote: Originally posted by Grachus: quote: Originally posted by donniejanuarysr: An update from Oklahoma . The state law passed today, 37 to 9, had a few liberals in the mix, an amendment to place the Ten Commandments on the front entrance to the state capitol. The feds in D.C., along with the ACLU, said it would be a mistake. Hey this is a conservative state, based on Christian values...! Guess what..........We did it anyway. We recently passed a law in the state to incarcerate all illegal immigrants, and ship them back to where they came from, unless they want to get a green card and become an American citizen. They all scattered. Hope we didn't send any of them to your state. This was against the advice of the Federal Government, and the ACLU, they said it would be a mistake. Guess what..........we did it anyway. Yesterday we passed a law to include DNA samples from any and all illegals to the Oklahoma database, for criminal investigative purposes. Pelosi said it was unconstitutional. Guess what........they did it anyway. Several weeks ago, we passed a law, declaring Oklahoma as a Sovereign state, not under the Federal Government directives. That, for your information, makes Oklahoma and Texas the only states to do so. Guess what.........More states are likely to follow. Louisiana, Alabama, Georgia, both Carolina's, Tennessee, Kentucky, Missouri, Arkansas, West Virginia, just to name a few. Should Mississippi act, so will Florida . Save your confederate money, it appears the South is about to rise up once again. The federal Government has made bold steps to take away our guns. Oklahoma, a week ago, passed a law confirming people in this state have the right to bear arms and transport them in their vehicles. I'm sure that was a set back for the Kennedys and Ms Pelosi. Guess what..........they did it anyway. By the way, Obama does not like any of this. Guess what....who cares...they are doing it anyway. They ain't skeert of the liberal press..God bless 'em. I hope the rest of the country finds the balls to act before it's too late. Joe Nugent By the way from what i understand this was done June of last year.(2008) D.J. -- Last time I checked, it's the Supreme Court which is going to determine whether these laws are Constitutional or not. And when they DO shoot down some or all of these laws, Oklahoma is going to tuck in its tail and obey. No individual or group of individuals determines what is and what is NOT the law. Dave Tell that to George Washington and the Minute Men!... Then there was this little set to about "No taxation without representation!"... Respectfully, SUNLINER81
